short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select and highlight elements on a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin Name: Element Selector Pro

Plugin Description:
Discovering web elements has never been easier! Element Selector Pro is a powerful Chrome extension tailored for web developers and designers. With this extension, you can effortlessly select and highlight any element on a webpage, and obtain detailed information about it.

Key Features:
- **Element Selection and Highlighting**: Instantly select and highlight webpage elements with a single click, making your selections clear and visible.
- **Detailed Information Display**: Access comprehensive information about the selected element, including tag name, class names, ID, dimensions, and more, aiding you in quick analysis and debugging.
- **Shortcut Key Support**: Customize your own shortcut keys for efficient and convenient element selection.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: A clean and intuitive user interface ensures you can get started quickly without a steep learning curve.
- **Manifest V3 Compatibility**: Adopting the latest Manifest V3 specification ensures the security and performance of the extension, aligning with the latest standards of the Chrome Web Store.
- **Adaptive SVG Icon**: A meticulously designed SVG icon that adapts to various screen sizes, combining aesthetics with functionality.

Element Selector Pro is your go-to assistant in web development and design, making element selection a breeze. Install now and embark on your journey of exploring web elements!

[Install Button]

Note: This extension is completely free and ad-free, dedicated to providing the best user experience. We look forward to your feedback to continuously improve and optimize the plugin's features.
